item.title: Android Development With Kotlin
item.description: Part 1 Basic Introduction and Control Flow. TOPICS: Basic Control Flow PROJECTS: Linear layout using the Layout Editor Part 2 Classes and Objects TOPICS: Sealed Classes Part 3 Generics, nested and enum classes. TOPICS: Enum Classes Part 4 Delegation and delegated properties. TOPICS: Delegated Properties

item.title: iOS Mobile Development
